name: BAPBAP
description:
BAPBAP is a Free-to-Play Battle Royale game. Squad up with friends as a Trio, choose from a diverse cast of unique characters and fight to be the last team standing. 

Choose from a diverse cast of characters each equipped with unique abilities.

You can be a ruthless huntress, an undead assassin and even a fishtank.

Bring up to 2 friends and drop in as a Trio.

Strategize, coordinate and craft new tactics to win.

Show no chill and style on your enemies.

Prove your worth by ranking up the leaderboards.

🔥Play Now!🔥

😤Whishlist on Steam!😤

🎮Join on Discord🎮
